mapper.select: SELECT etudiant_app_id, cip, nom, courriel, programme, programme_nom, app, app_titre, ap, departement, faculte, universite FROM app.v_etudiant_app where etudiant_app_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app.trimestre( trimestre_id, trimestre, debut, fin, inscription) VALUES (#{trimestre.trimestre_id}, #{trimestre.trimestre}, #{trimestre.debut}, #{trimestre.fin}, #{trimestre.inscription});
